doc:
Julie Dreyfus https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julie_Dreyfus 0 Julie Dreyfus (born January 24, 1966) is a French actress. Dreyfus is well known in Japan where she made her TV debut on a French-language lesson program on NHK's educational channel in the late 1980s. She has appeared on the TV show Ryōri no Tetsujin (Iron Chef) as a guest and judge. She is best known to western audiences for her appearances in the Quentin Tarantino films Kill Bill and Inglourious Basterds, in which she played Sofie Fatale and Francesca Mondino respectively. Aside from her native French she is fluent in Japanese and English. Julie_Dreyfus ( born January_24 , 1966 ) is a_French_actress . Dreyfus is_well_known in Japan where she made her_TV_debut on a_French-language_lesson_program on NHK 's_educational_channel in the_late_1980s . She has_appeared on the_TV_show_Ryōri_no_Tetsujin_(_Iron_Chef_) as a_guest_and_judge . She is_best_known to western_audiences for her_appearances in the_Quentin_Tarantino_films Kill Bill_and_Inglourious_Basterds , in which she played Sofie_Fatale and Francesca_Mondino respectively . Aside from her_native_French she is fluent in Japanese_and_English .
